articles.title: Soccer-Messi, Haaland, Mbappe nominated for Ballon d'Or
articles.description:
Argentina forward Lionel Messi was among the nominees for the men's Ballon d'Or trophy announced by organisers France Football magazine on Wednesday. Seven-times winner Messi, who plays for Inter Miami, led Argentina to World Cup glory in Qatar in December, their first triumph since 1986.
The awards for the best men's and women's player in the world will be presented on Oct. 30.
articles.content:
Argentina forward Lionel Messi was among the nominees for the men's Ballon d'Or trophy announced by organisers France Football magazine on Wednesday.

articles.description: Seven-time winner Messi led Argentina to World Cup glory in Qatar last December, their first triumph since 1986. articles.title: DHL Express opens freighter route to Argentina
articles.description: A DHL airline has begun providing regular connectivity to Argentina within the DHL parcel network.
articles.content:
DHL Express has expanded its network with the introduction of the first dedicated freighter flight to Argentina, giving importers and exporters improved shipment reliability and faster delivery.
